Package model.rooms

Class RoomList

java.lang.Object
model.rooms.RoomList
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class RoomList extends Object implements Serializable
The purpose of this class is to store an arrayList of Room Objects in order to manage them
See Also:
